기본정보.수업목표:
This  course  will  offer  the  first  set  of  essential  survival  skills  for  a  computer  scientist.  Upon successfully completing the course, students will feel comfortable giving answers to the following basic everyday computer science questions:
(1) How do we represent the real-world data to be processed by computer programs?
(2) How do we write computer programs to efficiently process these data representations? 
(3) How do we analyze computer programs?
기본정보.직전강의평가\n및\nCQI반영사항:
1. 난이도가 높은 이론에 대해서는 보다 자세한 설명
2. 프로그래밍 실습을 통해, 구현 능력 배양
기본정보.주교재: Data Strucutures and Algorithms in Python-Michael T. Goodrich, Roberto Tamassia, Michael H. Goldwasser-WILEY-2013
기본정보.저자: Michael T. Goodrich, Roberto Tamassia, Michael H. Goldwasser

평가방법.√: 평가방법 조정(대독, 구두응답, 도우미 대필 답안작성 등)
